title: Mild mango and red pepper salsa
ingredients: ['1 mango - peeled, stone removed and diced', '1 teaspoon extra virgin olive oil', '1/2 red pepper, chopped', '2 spring onions, thinly sliced', 'handful chopped fresh coriander', '1 lime, juiced', '1/4 teaspoon salt', '1 pinch cracked black pepper', '1 teaspoon honey']
